naslov: House/apartment in Vinišće with a fenominal view (prodaja)
opis: For sale is a dwelling that consists top floor af a house (aprox 86m2) with a multi purpose ground floor space with a full bathroom which could be easily converted into an appartment (aprox 45m2). Stairs lead to a large terrace (aprox 35m2) which leads to the entrance of the main dwelling. It consists of a generous entrance room, leading to open concept kitchen and living area. 1 large Master bedroom, 1 smaller bedroom and a bathroom with a large shower, laundry and vanity. living room has large sliding doors leading to a balcony thats the whole width of the house and is accessible from the master bedroom also. It has a fenominal view of the bay and the village. The roof is a 3-way maintenance responsibility but the large space under the roof belongs to the dwelling. Ownership is clear 1/1 in sellers name. Asking price is 199,000e Prodaje se Stan koji je cijeli gornji kat u kući, potpuno odvojen sa svojim ulazom,dvorištem, parking i garažom. Odličan pogled na cijelo selo i more. Renovirano 2021. 2 sobe, komodni wc sa mašinama za pranje i sušenje i veliki otvoreni prostor sa novom kužinom i dnevnim boravkom. oko 82m2. Prizemniji dio/prostor je uređen sa WC, veliki tuš, kuhinjica, skladište, konobica i mogućnost parking auta. Oko 45m2. Površina terase oko 35m2. Krov je dužnost 1/3 održavanja koji je potpuno napravjen novi 2018. Veliki Prostor ispod krova prepada stanu. Vlastnički list je 1/1. Cijena je 199,000e
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
